summary: The markdown document provides a comprehensive improvement proposal for the AI code review architecture, outlining the current limitations and a per-file review strategy that enhances scalability, quality, and operational performance.

issues.title: High-Level Overview
issues.message: The document provides a broad high-level overview and does not introduce specific technical details or implementations that can be tested directly.
issues.code_snippet: # AI Code Review Architecture Improvement Proposal

positive_feedback: The proposal is well-structured and detailed, outlining specific areas for improvement in the AI code review system.
Clear benefits are provided for switching to a per-file review architecture, addressing scalability and quality challenges effectively.
The document includes implementation status and expected outcomes, giving a thorough overview of project success.
